mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.product_option_id, c.product_count, c.product_YN, o.color, o.size, p.product_base_price + o.additional_price AS final_price, p.product_name FROM user_shopping_cart c JOIN product_option o ON c.product_option_id = o.product_option_id JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} and product_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_shopping_cart (user_id, product_option_id, product_count, product_YN) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productOptionId}, #{productCount}, #{productYN})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_shopping_cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_option_id = #{productOptionId}
